title: Live Updates: U.S. Attacks Iran as Trump Calls for Overthrow of Government
summary_full: Explosions resounded in Tehran as President Trump said that the United States had begun a large assault. Air-raid sirens blared in Israel, which also said it was striking Iran.
summary_public: Explosions resounded in Tehran as President Trump said that the United States had begun a large assault. Air-raid sirens blared in Israel, which also said it was striking Iran.
